name: KiboAutomation
description: A simple Node app built on Express, instantly up and running.

scripts.start:dev: cross-env DOMAIN=https://kibopush-imran.ngrok.io DEBUG=KiboAutomation:* PORT=3051 SECURE_PORT=8443 NODE_ENV=development nodemon server.js
scripts.debug: cross-env DOMAIN=https://kibopush-imran.ngrok.io DEBUG=express:router:route,express:application,KiboAutomation:* PORT=3000 SECURE_PORT=8443 NODE_ENV=development nodemon server.js
